executable.title: Segment based on rectangular region of joint histogram (BRAINS)
executable.description: This tool creates binary regions based on segmenting multiple image modalitities at once.
executable.contributor: Hans J. Johnson, hans-johnson -at- uiowa.edu, http://www.psychiatry.uiowa.edu
executable.acknowledgements: Hans Johnson(1,3,4); Gregory Harris(1), Vincent Magnotta(1,2,3); (1=University of Iowa Department of Psychiatry, 2=University of Iowa Department of Radiology, 3=University of Iowa Department of Biomedical Engineering, 4=University of Iowa Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering)

image.name: inputVolumes
image.label: Input Image Volumes
image.description: The input image volumes for finding the largest region filled mask.

image.name: inputMaskVolume
image.label: Input Mask
image.description: The ROI for region to compute histogram levels.

image.name: outputROIMaskVolume
image.label: Output Mask
image.description: The ROI automatically found from the input image.

image.name: outputClippedVolumeROI
image.label: Output Image Clipped by ROI
image.description: The inputVolume clipped to the region of the brain mask.

double-vector.label: Lower Threshold
double-vector.description: Lower thresholds on the valid histogram regions for each modality

double-vector.name: upperThreshold
double-vector.label: Upper Threshold
double-vector.description: Upper thresholds on the valid histogram regions for each modality
